sense.def:
Simulation
je to, da se pretvarjamo, ali rezultat posnemanja nečesa.

seg.quote: Her remark had been greeted with a simulation of diffidence
The viewer was unable to distinguish reality from simulation.

sense.def:
A simulation
je tudi poskus, da bi problem rešili tako, da ga predstavimo matematično, pogosto z računalnikom;

seg.quote: Computer modelling and simulation have been used as an aid to battle tactics.
